title: NASA to Discuss Latest EMIT Findings, Helps Address Climate Change
summary: NASA will host a media teleconference at 3 p.m. EDT Tuesday, Oct. 25, to discuss the latest findings of the agency’s Earth Surface Mineral Dust Source Investigation (EMIT), including a new, unanticipated capability which will help better understand impacts of climate change.

title: OneWeb launch sign of greater role for India in commercial launch market
summary: The launch of a set of OneWeb satellites on an Indian rocket could be the harbinger of a greater role India will play in a commercial launch industry straining to satisfy demand.

title: Grasp acquires AirPhoton to form Grasp Global
summary: French startup Grasp SAS has acquired Baltimore, Maryland-based AirPhoton to create Grasp Global, a U.S. Earth-observation company.

title: ESA finalizes package for ministerial
summary: ESA is putting the finishing touches on a package of programs it will ask its member states to support at a council meeting in November.

title: NASA to Participate in ASCEND Conference, Brief Media on Tech Demo
summary: NASA leaders, including Deputy Administrator Pam Melroy, will participate in the 2022 ASCEND conference, hosted by the American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics (AIAA) in Las Vegas from Monday, Oct. 24, through Wednesday, Oct. 26.
